77NDA YANDA KU AMBA KAAMBO
I LOVE TO THE STORY
Nda yanda kwamba kambo Ka zi tali bonyi,
Jesu a colwe cakwe A luyando lwakwe
Nda yanda kwamba kambo, Mbwe ndi zyi kasimpe
Ka la ndi komanisya Kuli zintu zyonse.
CIINDULULO:
Nda yanda kwamba kambo,
Ka la ba colwe cangu,
Kwamba kambo ka kale
Ka luyando lwakwe
Nda yanda kwamba kambo, Ka la inda konse
Nko tu yanda ku yeya Mu kulota kwesu;
Nda yanda kwamba kambo, Aka ka ndi vuna
Nce ndi Ômba kambo kaka Kuli iwe lino.
Nda yanda kwamba kambo Kainu, kukamba
Lyonse ni nda kanana, ka inda ku bota;
Nda yanda kwamba kambo, Bamwi ba tana mvwa,
Kambo ka kufutuka MwiBuku lya Leza.
